course_description: This course deals with advanced econometric methods for the analysis of models and applications in micro-econometrics. Topics include cross-section and panel data models, limited dependent variables, generalized method of moments, quantile estimation, treatment effect and program evaluation techniques, semi and nonparametric methods, nonlinear and simultaneous equation models.
sections: Class Nbr: 3447, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 8-11a, Instructor: S. Khan, Status: Open
